mainBoard.name: Ancestral Recall
mainBoard.originalText: Draw 3 cards or force opponent to draw 3 cards.

mainBoard.name: Black Lotus
mainBoard.originalText: Adds 3 mana of any single color of your choice to your mana pool, then is discarded. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.
mainBoard.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add three mana of any one color.

foreignData.name: Artefaktduplikat
foreignData.text: Wähle ein beliebiges Artefakt im Spiel aus. Dieser Zauber erschafft eine Kopie dieses Artefakts; das Duplikat wird sowohl von Sprüchen, die für Verzauberungen gelten, als auch von Sprüchen, die für Artefakte gelten, betroffen. Das Duplikat überdauert auch den Tod des Originalartefakts. Verzauberungen, die auf das Originalartefakt gesprochen wurden, werden nicht mitkopiert.

mainBoard.name: Copy Artifact
mainBoard.originalText: Select any artifact in play. This enchantment acts as a duplicate of that artifact; it is affected by cards that affect either enchantments or artifacts. The copy remains even if the original artifact is destroyed. Enchantments on the original artifact are not copied.

rulings.text: The artifact to copy is chosen at the time this card enters. If there is no valid artifact to choose, then this card enters as an enchantment that has no effect.

The copy is both an artifact and an enchantment, so it is an artifact-enchantment (perhaps even an artifact-creature-enchantment). It can be affected by anything which affects either type of permanent.
The copy of the artifact is not still blue. It copies the color of the thing it is copying.

mainBoard.text: You may have this enchantment enter as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield, except it's an enchantment in addition to its other types.

mainBoard.name: Counterspell
mainBoard.originalText: Counters target spell as it is being cast.

foreignData.name: Kraftsog
foreignData.text: Dein Gegner muß alles Mana aus seinem verfügbaren Ländern produzieren. Dieses Mana und alles Mana, das er in seinem Manavorrat hat, fließt nun in Deinen Manavorrat.

mainBoard.name: Drain Power
mainBoard.originalText: Opponent must draw all mana from his or her available lands; this mana and all mana in opponent's mana pool drains into your mana pool. You can't take less than all your opponent's mana.

rulings.text: If a land can draw a variable amount of mana, the target player (not the player of this spell) chooses how much to draw.

This card forces the target player to draw mana from lands if they are untapped, but that player can choose how to draw the mana if a land they control has multiple mana abilities, or mana abilities with choices.
Your opponent may use instants and abilities of permanents in response to this spell before you get the mana.
A mana ability is an ability that (1) isn't a loyalty ability, (2) doesn't target, and (3) could add mana when it resolves.

mainBoard.text: Target player activates a mana ability of each land they control. Then that player loses all unspent mana and you add the mana lost this way.

foreignData.name: Verborgenes Wissen
foreignData.text: Alle Spieler müssen, wenn sie an der Reihe sind, beim Kartenziehen eine zusätzliche Karte nehmen.

mainBoard.name: Howling Mine
mainBoard.originalText: Each player must draw one extra card during the draw phase of each of his or her turns.

rulings.text: If Howling Mine leaves the battlefield before it resolves, then the last known tap or untap state of the card is used for resolution.
It does not trigger at all if this is tapped at the start of the draw step, and it checks this again on resolution.
The additional draw is separate from any other draw during your draw step. It happens when the triggered ability resolves.
The triggered ability is put onto the stack after you have already drawn your card for the turn.

mainBoard.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if this artifact is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Leviathan
mainBoard.originalText:
Trample
Leviathan comes into play tapped, and does not untap as normal during your untap phase.
Sacrifice two islands during your upkeep phase to untap Leviathan.
Leviathan may not attack unless you sacrifice two islands during your attack.

rulings.text: You don't have to pay the untap cost if it is untapped outside the upkeep phase or is untapped by an effect.

mainBoard.text:
Trample
This creature enters tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap this creature.
This creature can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

mainBoard.name: Mox Sapphire
mainBoard.originalText: Add 1 blue mana to your mana pool. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

foreignData.name: Starre
foreignData.text: Alle Spieler erhalten keine Enttap-Phase mehr. Bezahle {U} während Deiner Versorgungsphase oder vernichte die Starre.

mainBoard.name: Stasis
mainBoard.originalText: Players do not get an untap phase. Pay {U} during your upkeep or Stasis is destroyed; cards still do not untap until the next untap phase.

rulings.text: Does not prevent cards from being untapped outside the untap step.
Since there is no untap step, Phasing in/out won't happen.

mainBoard.text:
Players skip their untap steps.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this enchantment unless you pay {U}.

mainBoard.name: Time Walk
mainBoard.originalText: Take an extra turn after this one.

rulings.text: If multiple "extra turn" effects resolve in the same turn, take them in the reverse of the order that the effects resolved. In other words, the most recently created extra turn is taken first.

mainBoard.text: Take an extra turn after this one.

mainBoard.name: Timetwister
mainBoard.originalText: Set Timetwister aside in a new graveyard pile. Shuffle your hand, library, and graveyard together into a new library and draw a new hand of seven cards, leaving all cards in play where they are; opponent must do the same.

rulings.text: This card won’t be put into your graveyard until after it’s finished resolving, which means it won’t be shuffled into your library as part of its own effect.

mainBoard.text: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. (Then put Timetwister into its owner's graveyard.)

mainBoard.name: Twiddle
mainBoard.originalText: Caster may tap or untap any one land, creature, or artifact in play. No effects are generated by the target card.

rulings.text: The decision whether or not to tap or untap is made on resolution. This is not a modal spell.
This is not a toggle effect. If you use Twiddle to tap a card and before it takes effect your opponent taps it, Twiddle will not automatically untap the card.

mainBoard.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

mainBoard.name: Unstable Mutation
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gains +3/+3. Each round, put a -1/-1 counter on the creature during its controller's upkeep. These counters remain even if this enchantment is removed before the creature dies.

rulings.text: The -1/-1 counters stay even if the Aura is removed, and the +3/+3 goes away when the Aura does.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: After Kroog was destroyed while most of its defenders were at his side, Urza vowed that none of his allies would ever need to fear for their own defense again, even while laying siege to a city far from their homes.
mainBoard.name: Yotian Soldier
mainBoard.originalText: Attacking does not cause Yotian Soldier to tap.

mainBoard.flavorText: Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.
mainBoard.name: Zephyr Falcon
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Attacking does not cause Zephyr Falcon to tap.

foreignData.name: Blauer Urknall
foreignData.text: Neutralisiert einen roten Zauberspruch oder zerstört eine rote Karte im Spiel.

sideBoard.name: Blue Elemental Blast
sideBoard.originalText: Counters a red spell being cast or destroys a red card in play.

rulings.text: The decision to counter a spell or destroy a permanent is a decision made on announcement before the target is selected. If the spell is redirected, this mode can't be changed, so only targets of the selected type are valid.

sideBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target red spell.
• Destroy target red permanent.

foreignData.name: Lebenszeichen
foreignData.text: Für jeden Wald Deines Gegners, der getappt wird, erhältst Du 1 Lebenspunkt.

sideBoard.name: Lifetap
sideBoard.originalText: You gain 1 life each time any forest of opponent's becomes tapped.

rulings.text: Gives one life for each and every Forest tapped.
In multi-player games it affects all opponents.

sideBoard.text: Whenever a Forest an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.
